alert.note: Alert for Lewis; Mason (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 24 at 3:49AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EAST CENTRAL MASON, LEWIS, SOUTHERN ADAMS AND SOUTHWESTERN SCIOTO COUNTIES THROUGH 415 AM EDT... At 349 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Tollesboro, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Manchester, Vanceburg, Head of Grassy, Camp Dix, Tollesboro, Rome, Foxport, Concord, Trinity, Saint Paul, Kinniconick, Rectorville, Epworth, Ribolt, Charters, Petersville, Stricklett, Rexton, Sandy Springs and Buena Vista in Scioto County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
